title: Firm Opposition!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hey, Kanata.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>What is it~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That thing on your channel.... The sleepy stream.... I want you to stop doing that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeeh, but why? People tell me that it’s pretty relaxing, you know~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s it! It’s too relaxing! I fell asleep watching it the other day!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You did? Did you have a good dream?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>W-, well.... It certainly wasn’t bad....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, Kanata was helpful to Yoshiko-chan, yay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m telling you that you weren’t! Also, it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yohane-chan, don’t forget to have more good dreams with my sleepy stream again, okay~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
